overview: The Peanuts gang prepares for the end of the school year while Charlie Brown continues to pine for the Little Red Haired Girl in You're In Love, Charlie Brown . The collection also includes five short adventures from The Charlie Brown and Snoopy Show ("Kite Eating Tree," "Sally," "Camp," "Luce Loves Schroeder," and "Scared Snoopy").
title: Happiness Is Peanuts: Friends Forever
